unnormalised: Boro, office-antuntleo schedule-o samballop mhunnllear kednam kednam bill'leanchi manddki samballta tea bhaxen dista, khas korun soglleanchea vyaktigat vavrank lagun ani satat cholteleo meetings-ak lagun? Tori punn, ami khorem mhonnllear tem koxem kortev, vo atam tori, korunk *proyotn* kortev tea vixim uloum-ia.
normalised: Bore, office-ant schedules samballopacho kitlo tras zata tem tumkam khobor asa, khas korun soglleanchea vyaktigat zabadareank lagun ani nirantar choltoch astana mitings? Bore, ami tem koxem korta, vo komat komi korpacho prayatn korta, hache vixim uloya.

unnormalised: Poilem mhonnllear, ek tem dhorunk sodpachem asta jem *soglleank* fava poddta. Tem ekdom eka puranik sodkhoxe bhaxen zata. Tum Priya, Rakesh, ani Aisha hea tumchea sangaticheamkarank ek project-achi surveatichea meeting-achi mahiti dita. Priya-k dor eka Mangllara 6:00 PM IST-ak tichea nachacho class asta. Rakesh-ak 10/10/2024 hea tarikher donparchea vellar doctorak vochunk asa. Aisha-n Budhvarak sokallim 11 AM-ak ek client-ak call korpak soddun dovurla. Ani magir tumi, tumchech vavrant gunthun asta!
normalised: Poile suvater, soglle zonn fursaatint assa tem vell sodpachi gozal asa. Tem lagbhog ek pouranik shodhn. Tum Priya, Rakesh, ani Aisha haka project kickoff meeting-a vixim sangta. Priya haka dar eka mangalvara sanzchea saa vaztak dance class asa. Rakesh haka das octobre don hazar viesaantaras dupara doktorache appointment asa. Aisha budvara egar vaztak client call-ak poilechea vochon book kela. Ani magir, tumcheo svatahchea zabadareo asa!

unnormalised: Magir time zones vixim dubav yetat. Amchi team Mumbai, Delhi, ani America-antlean pasun remottli kam korpache lok asa. 2:00 PM IST-ak call kellyar tumkam disonk xakta ki pachim daryaveller ravteleank to call sokallim 4:30 AM PST-ak zoddcho poddla. Barek na, sori? Ami samballunk proyotn kortat, punn kednam kednam, last tarikha last tarikhich astat. Hanvem ekdavim team-ak ratchea 3:30 vaztam meeting dovurli kiteak hanv tankam samkench bodolunk visrun gel'lo.
normalised: Magir time zones vixim gondoll utpon zata. Amchea kolkaranche Mumbai, Delhi-ant ani kai zonn remote-an you-es-saun kam korta. Don vaztak call set keli to zalear panch vazta dusreatt-ek-kausata chaitraani tum west coast-ar assa to zalear tumchar vaztak pi-es-ti-ak sangata yeunchi podtta. Borem na, hanch na? Ami dhyan divpacho prayatn karta, punn kiteak zalear deadline asat. Ekdaan mhanak teen tis vazta meeting set keli kiteak zalear vel samballopacho visrun gelo.

unnormalised: Sarkari Suttieo visrunk favona. Ekaekuch 15/08/2024 (Svotontr Divas) zata ani ordhi team tem utsov somorpak suttieo gheta. Tea satolleant koslench kam korop mhunnllear nadint poinpari dista. Ani Bharotant khup utsov astat. Tumkam Diwali, Eid, Holi, Christmas ani khup proxik utsov astat. Dekhun, eksarkem kam korpache vor dhorunk khup avghadd zata.
normalised: Sarkari suktichem aanandvisroun vishru naco. Achanak, pandhra august don hazar viesaantaras (svatantrata divas) yetoch annek zonn utsou karta. Hya utsavachea hafte-ant kiteam korun ghetoch vata mhanlear uddheant budun vhan veta toxem. Ani bhartant annek utsou asat. Tumchi Diwali, Eid, Holi, Christmas ani annek pradeshik asat. Taka lagun sadharan kam korpacho vell sodhpaant chodd tras zata.

unnormalised: Remotli kam korpache udexentlea porinnamamni sadhna-kui uddounk yetat. Jea vellar dhoronn svotontr asta, ti schedule korpak khattinn zatat. Lok bhurgeamni nirall astole, vhoddleanchem nirall ghetele, vo sadhech jivitachea ritink zoddpak veg-veglle vorant kam kortole. Tem adharit kamachem fal ani sadhech mukha-mukhi voranchem porimann kam astole, jem khorem mhonnllear vaitt na.
normalised: Remote kam-achea udheant ek sadhi kholi vattaant aili. Vingddi vingddi suvidha bhov bori asli tori-e, scheduling thode trasachi zata. Lok balapnachea bhurgeacho bhog samballta, vhoddleank samballta, vo aplyank fovoll asa titlo kam karta. Utpann dil’le vixayacher chodd dhyan dita ani samne samne kam korun utram divpache kam zata hach kaim tras disna.

unnormalised: Dekhun, sangachem gupt kitem? Khorench mhonnllear kainch na. Punn thoddim vostu modot kortat. Google Calendar vo Outlook Calendar sarkhim vantto ghetl'lim calendar vaprun jivit sokhem korunk xakta. Nirmoll sangop hem mahatvachem – tumchi mellopachi survat ani koslich bandhonna tumkam asli zalear sangunk dhir dhorta. Polling, doodle polling-um modot korunk xaktat. Ani dhir ani samajhdarponachi kaddi lamb dut vochunk poddta.
normalised: Tor gupt upai kitem? Sacchem mhanlear kai nair. Punn thode vatter madat karta. Google Calendar vo Outlook Calendar vaparta tenna jivan rakhon vata. Spasht sangop khub garjechem - tumchi favo ani tumchea addchan vixim sangop sarkhem. Polls ani doodle polls-ui madda karta. Ani bore torant mellta toslem anubhav ani samzanik jivan rakhon vatta.

unnormalised: Nimannem, office scheduling ek sadhocholnecho khel. Tem eka barek jagear mellopachem asa jea jagear soglle fol'laddikponn dibacho divnk xaktat, tankam apnnech jivitachea boremponnk nash kortanant. Tem dhir ghetele, sabrannponnk ghetle, ani ek mellapanchi khuxi zateli. Ani punn, ek thoddi kismat!
normalised: Nimanne, office scheduling thodem samballopachea kamsak sarkhem asta. Vhoddli thikani koxe sodchi zatuch konnech apli yogdan diunk xakta, aplyak trast zaina astana. Haka prayatn zai, dharya zai ani samjutanek tayar ravpachem zai. Ani bore nase zalear nasib!
